trends: There have been no other sightings in Franklin
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting Detailsjust pulled up fro,town steped out truck studying a plane then 500 to 800 feet behind plane very bright orb....couldnt tell a shape really to bright to tell....lit up everything around dogs went crazy...never made a sound just flew silently acroos the sky to the southeast i just stood there in awe and watched as it passed by...flew into the clouds and never saw it again...ive been a skeptic all my life till i saw that....nobody beleives me and now all i do is think about them....luckly some freinds came two weeks later and i got on the subject....my freinds wife said she and her mother in law saw the samething....it was tree top high and if id walk thirty feet over i woulda been under it....never saw anything like that before and would like to get some answeres so i could finally get it out of my mind....since this sighting i stare into space everynight and see crazy things and several lights that dont blink but fly around very fast....they look like stars very hight up with fst speeds
